outputs.output_descr:
The project aim to develop the individual capacities of the Directors and General Directors at all PA ministries and authorities, to make sure that all are provided with the necessary skills and competences to carry out their roles effectively in support the overall national development goals of the Palestinian Authority.

In this programme, we trained 800 senior civil servant (in the West Bank) in leadership and administrative competencies. So that number of senior civil servants, who will implement the professional development plans at their workplace to discuss jointly problems and solutions, deliver better services. Also, the improvement the ability of senior civil service to manage development projects and administration, guide and effect change within their organization

Training programme includes; Human Resource management, Strategic Planning, Policy Formulation, Leadership Concepts and Techniques, Communication Skills, Change Management, Crises management, Conflict management, Financial Awareness and Legal Framework.
